simpleExplanation.title: Why Does This Matter? üåç
simpleExplanation.point1: Blockchain networks use a lot of computers working 24/7 to keep everything secure
simpleExplanation.point2: These computers need electricity, which often comes from fossil fuels
simpleExplanation.point3: Mining equipment gets outdated quickly, creating electronic waste
simpleExplanation.point4: The good news: Many networks are moving to greener solutions!
